text: Brockton is a town in Plymouth County in the U.S. state of Massachusetts. It and the town of Plymouth are the county seats of Plymouth County. Brockton is also called 'the city of champions' because world boxing champions Rocky Marciano and Marvin Hagler came from there. It is also home to a large number of Haitians who speak Haitian Creole. == References == Category:Cities in Massachusetts Category:County seats in Massachusetts
title: Brockton, Massachusetts
